get.description: Retrieve a specific software platform and its basic properties.

404.description: Not Found. Software Platform with given ID doesn't exist.

put.description: Update the basic properties of a software platform (e.g. name). References to sub-objects (e.g. a compute resource) are not updated via this operation - use the corresponding sub-route for updating them (e.g. via PUT on /compute-resources/{computeResourceId}).

404.description: Not Found. Software Platform with given ID doesn't exist.

delete.description: Delete a software platform. This also removes all references to other entities (e.g. compute resource)

404.description: Not Found. Software Platform with given ID doesn't exist.

get.description: Retrieve all software platforms.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter criteria for this query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.description: Define the basic properties of a software platform. References to sub-objects (e.g. a compute resource) can be added via sub-routes (e.g. via POST on /compute-resources).

get.description: Get a specific implementations of a software platform. If none are found an empty list is returned.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter criteria for this query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

404.description: Not Found. Software Platform or Implementation with given IDs don't exist.

post.description: Add a reference to an existing implementation (that was previously created via a POST on e.g. /algorithms/{algorithmId}/ implementations). Only the ID is required in the request body, other attributes will be ignored and not changed.

404.description: Not Found. Software platform or implementation with given IDs don't exist or reference was already added.

get.description: Retrieve a specific implementation of a software platform. If none are found an empty list is returned.

schema.description: Either a quantum or a classic implementation
Either a quantum or a classic implementation

404.description: Not Found. Software platform or implementation with given IDs don't exist.

schema.description: Either a quantum or a classic implementation

delete.description: Delete a reference to a implementation of an software platform. The reference has to be previously created via a POST on /software-platforms/{softwarePlatformId}/implementations).

404.description: Not Found. Software platform or implementation with given IDs don't exist or no reference exists.

get.description: Retrieve referenced cloud services of a software platform. If none are found an empty list is returned.

parameters.description: Filter criteria for this query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

404.description: Not Found. Software platform or implementation with given IDs don't exist.

post.description: Add a reference to an existing cloud service (that was previously created via a POST on e.g. /cloud-services). Only the ID is required in the request body, other attributes will be ignored and not changed.

404.description: Not Found. Software Platform or Cloud Service with given IDs don't exist or reference was already added.

delete.description: Delete a reference to a {object} of an {object}. The reference has to be previously created via a POST on /software-platforms/{softwarePlatformId}/cloud-services).

404.description: Not Found. Software Platform or Cloud Service with given IDs don't exist or no reference exists.

get.description: Retrieve referenced compute resource properties of an implementation. If none are found an empty list is returned.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request body or algorithm resource is not implemented algorithm of implementation.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm or implementation with given IDs don't exist.

post.description: Add a compute resource property (e.g. a certain number of qubits) that is required by an implementation. The compute resource property type has to be already created (e.g. via POST on /compute-resource-property-types). As a result only the ID is required for the compute resource property type, other attributes will be ignored not changed.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request body or algorithm resource is not implemented algorithm of implementation.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm, implementation or compute resource property type with given IDs don't exist.

get.description: Retrieve a specific compute resource property of an implementation.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm, implementation or compute resource property with given IDs don't exist.

put.description: Update a Compute resource property of an implementation. For the compute resource property type only the ID is required, other compute resource property type attributes will be ignored and not changed.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request body or algorithm resource is not implemented algorithm of implementation.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm, implementation, compute resource property or compute resource type with given IDs don't exist.

delete.description: Delete a Compute resource property of an implementation. The compute resource property type is not affected by this.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid request body or algorithm resource is not implemented algorithm of implementation.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm, implementation or compute resource property with given IDs don't exist.

post.description: Create a relation between two algorithms.The algorithm relation type has to be already created (e.g. via POST on /algorithm-relation-types). As a result only the ID is required for the algorithm relation type, other attributes will be ignored not changed.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm, algorithm relation or algorithm relation type with given IDs don't exist.

delete.description: Delete a specific relation between a two algorithms. The algorithm relation type is not affected by this.

404.description: Not Found. Algorithm or algorithm relation with given IDs don't exist.

parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.description: Define the basic properties of a cloud service. References to sub-objects (e.g. a compute resource) can be added via sub-routes (e.g. POST on /cloud-services/{cloudServiceId}/compute-resources).

get.description: Retrieve a specific cloud service and its basic properties.

404.description: Not Found. Cloud service with given ID doesn't exist.

put.description: Update the basic properties of a cloud service (e.g. name). References to sub-objects (e.g. a compute resource) are not updated via this operation - use the corresponding sub-route for updating them (e.g. PUT on /compute-resources/{computeResourceId}).

404.description: Not Found. Cloud service with given ID doesn't exist.

delete.description: Delete a cloud service. This also removes all references to other entities (e.g. compute resource).

404.description: Not Found. Cloud service with given ID doesn't exist.

get.description: Retrieve referenced software platforms of an cloud service. If none are found an empty list is returned.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter criteria for this query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

404.description: Not Found. Cloud service with given ID doesn't exist.

get.description: Retrieve a specific compute resource and its basic properties.

References to sub-objects (e.g. a compute resource property) are not updated via this operation - use the corresponding sub-route for updating them (e.g. PUT on /compute-resources/{computeResourceId}/compute-resource-properties/{computeResourcePropertyId}).

404.description: Not Found. Compute Resource with given ID doesn't exist.

delete.description: Delete a compute resource. This also removes all references to other entities (e.g. software platform).

404.description: Not Found. Compute Resource with given ID doesn't exist.

get.description: Retrieve referenced compute resource properties of a compute resource. If none are found an empty list is returned.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter criteria for this query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

404.description: Not Found. Compute Resource with given ID doesn't exist.

post.description: Add a compute resource property (e.g. a certain number of qubits) that is provided by an compute resource. The compute resource property type has to be already created (e.g. via POST on /compute-resource-property-types). As a result only the ID is required for the compute resource property type, other attributes will be ignored not changed.

404.description: Not Found. Compute resource or compute resource property type with given IDs don't exist.

get.description: Retrieve a specific compute resource property of an compute resource.

404.description: Not Found. Compute resource or compute resource property with given IDs don't exist.

put.description: Update a Compute resource property of an compute resource. For the compute resource property type only the ID is required, other compute resource property type attributes will be ignored and not changed.

404.description: Not Found. Compute resource, compute resource property or compute resource type with given IDs don't exist.

delete.description: Delete a Compute resource property of an compute resource. The compute resource property type is not affected by this.

404.description: Not Found. Compute resource or compute resource property with given IDs don't exist.

get.description: Retrieve all compute resources.
